description:
The weeds have over grown the Café and Penguin seems to be the only person to care. Afterwards, Penguin finally confesses his love with great results!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Manatsu no Zassou Tori / Penguin-san no Romance
Weeding in the Summer / Mr. Penguin`s Romance
真夏の雑草取り / ペンギンさんのロマンス
